search_results.snippet: Rachel Carson House (Colesville, Maryland) The Rachel Carson House is a typical suburban ranch-style house, built in 1956 in Colesville, Maryland for Rachel Carson. Carson wrote her classic work Silent Spring there in 1962. The house was designated a National Historic Landmark in 1991.
